name: The Write Track
tagline: A simple game designed to allow toddlers to practice drawing letters using an interactive train
body:
## About the game
This is a simple game designed to teach your young one how to write. Each letter will first present a demonstration before allowing the player to try it on their own. Enjoy!

### Authors and Contributors
Mitchell Clutter (@mbclu), with the patience and support of my loving wife and 2 boys.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
